How many people are affected by Holt-Oram syndrome ?,"Holt-Oram syndrome is estimated to affect 1 in 100,000 individuals.",GHR,Holt-Oram syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Holt-Oram syndrome ?,"Mutations in the TBX5 gene cause Holt-Oram syndrome. This gene provides instructions for making a protein that plays a role in
